documentation.text: @dev Get total BNU token amount staked in contract
@dev Get user ticket slot for receiving NFT
@dev Get total BNU token amount staked by `account`

@dev User withdraw staked BNU from contract
 User will receive all staked BNU and reward BNU based on APY configuration

getTotalStaked().details: Get total BNU token amount staked in contract

getUserNftTicket(address,uint256,bool).details: Get user ticket slot for receiving NFT

getUserStakedAmount(address).details: Get total BNU token amount staked by `account`

stake(uint256).details: User join to stake BNU and have a chance to receive an NFT from AvatarArt  An NFT will be available within 30 days from contract created or date will be configured After that, this contract be only used to stake

withdraw(uint256).details: User withdraw staked BNU from contract User will receive all staked BNU and reward BNU based on APY configuration
